text: (nabiye!) mema pratiksepa karannan (apage dutaya vana obava genahæra dakvamin) “mohu kerehi mohuge deviyan vetin (api kæmati akarayata) kumak ho sadhakayak pahala kala yutu noveda?”yi pavasannaha. (eyata) oba mese pavasanu: “niyata vasayenma allah (danduvam kirimata) adahas karana ayava, væradi margayehi athæra damanneya. sampurnayenma ohu desatama sitinnanva rju margayehi ætulu karanneya”
